obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_147_0: * (Sob...) We don't even like fighting... th-the King left us no choice...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_159_0:
* Woah, nice cheer.
* Look, Kris, I've got fans.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_177_0: * I thought you were running away.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_186_0:
* Are you puzzled by COMBAT?
* Wanna know how TP works?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_187_0: * If you still haven't assembled all the details...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_188_0: * My cohorts to the WEST will gladly help you put the pieces together.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_193_0: * Your friends can't \cYACT\cW alone, but they can still help you win peacefully.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_194_0: * The \cGDARK PRINCE\cW's \cYPACIFY\cW spell can remove \cBTIRED\cW enemies safely from battle.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_195_0: * If nothing else, why not try using an \cYITEM\cW?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_196_0: * Even if it seems useless, the effects may surprise you.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_200_0:
* What?
* I'm building a ladder here.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_201_0:
* Today's lesson is...
* \cRGet out of my way when I'm building a ladder!\cW
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_202_0: * Do you need an \cRinteractive tutorial\cW on \cRleaving me alone\cW?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_206_0: * Do you need an \cRinteractive tutorial\cW on \cRleaving me alone\cW?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_214_0: * \cYDEFENDING\cW will not only temporarily \cRreduce the damage\cW you take...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_215_0: * It also lets you focus, \cYrestoring TP\cW. You need \cYTP\cW to \cRCAST SPELLS\cW!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_216_0:
* So don't be afraid to \cYDEFEND\cW!
* \cYDEFEND\cW and \cYCAST SPELLS\cW!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_217_0: * By the way, all leftover \cYTP\cW will \cRturn into extra MONEY\cW after the battle!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_221_0: * Getting close to \cYBULLETS\cW is really exciting, isn't it?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_222_0: * You'll \cRrecover a little\cW \cYTP\cW for each \cYBULLET\cW you get close to.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_223_0: * Plus, \cRgetting close to bullets\cW can sometimes end the \cRenemy's attack faster\cW.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_224_0:
* It's quite \cRdangerous\cW though.
* So no worries if you don't want to try.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_233_0:
* (It's a candy tree.)
* (All the ripe candy has been picked.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_236_0:
* (It's a candy tree.)
* (All the ripe candy has been picked.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_238_0:
* Let's not take any more, Kris.
* Unripe candy is sour.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_240_0: * What? Sour, sweet, meaty, bitter... if it's candy, it's good!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_248_0: * What kind of candy is meaty?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_250_0:
* Y'know.
* Whatever it's called.
* Uhhh, jerky.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_254_0: * Then why is it next to it in the store!?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_262_0:
* We're sorry.
* We're normally puzzle guys, but...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_263_0: * We've been forced to do TUTORIALS just to make ends meet.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_264_0: * When the KING got power, he fired everyone and replaced all puzzle makers with HIM...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_265_0:
* ROUXLS KAARD...
* Lord of the Puzzles...
* Be careful...!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_269_0: * The KING didn't even give us severance pay...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_270_0:
* His son just gave us all beanies...
* Itchy beanies...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_278_0: * Woah there, horsie. Ponmen're scary, but all'n they're doin' is following the King.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_279_0: * Us on the Board used to have our own boss... those'n were peaceful times.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_280_0: * But now, even the boss's been reduced to the King's peon...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_285_0: * Haha, and these? These are my nostrils, not my eyes.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_286_0: * ... can still see out of them, though.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_292_0: * Fear not - we, unlike the simple Ponmen, possess FULL faculty over our actions.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_293_0: * I, Mr. Society, am far too intelligent to ever bow down to such a tyrant!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_294_0:
* Unless he asks me.
* He's very scary, you see.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_297_0: * What, you think you possess the power to topple that brute???
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_298_0: * Yes! Yes! I'm sure everyone will support you! Go for it!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_299_0: * Just as long as I don't have to participate!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_304_0: * Hmmm... Mr. Elegance has run off on some hellish errand...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_305_0: * Huh? No, I didn't help out at all!!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_306_0: * Why are or aren't you asking!?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_316_0: * Hey, kid. We managed to fix up this old thingamajig for you.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_317_0: * It's some kinda door... It can take you anywhere you want in the world!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_318_0: * As long as that's one of two locations.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_319_0: * Anyhoo, we'll keep working on it... Anything to help you out, kid!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_322_0: * Hey kid, we managed to get this door to go to the castle.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_328_0: * Dunno... come to think of it, I've never seen it before.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_334_0: * Woah there, horsie. Me and Mr. Society got this door workin' for ya.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_335_0: * It can go anywhere you want... 'long as it's one of the two destinations.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_336_0: * Since it was just the two of us, it was tough work, and it might break.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_337_0: * Anyhow (ha ha) hope'n it helps you deal with the King.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_340_0: * Woah there, horsie. Mr. Society and the puzzle guy fixed that door.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_341_0: * Since it was just the three of us, it should work without any issues.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_342_0: * Anyhow (ha ha) hope'n it helps you deal with the King.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_346_0: * This door'll go even further than before.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_347_0: * Not sure'n what we did to make it work like that, but...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_352_0: * Now, don't tell anyone Mr. Society helped... he doesn't want none of that.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_353_0: * I'm watchin' ya now... with my nostrils.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_365_0:
* Don't mind me.
* I'm on break.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_366_0: * ... Say, help me. I need to get something for my friend \cYCLOVER\cW'S birthday.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_367_0: * Her only interests are \cYSPORTS\cW, \cYCUTE BOYS\cW, and \cYTREES\cW.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_368_0: * ... maybe I'll just get her a card.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_372_0: * Maybe I could put some money in the card... No, I need that!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_383_0: * I used to WORK at the castle until the KING fired all the STAFF.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_384_0: * What was my job? Oh, I was the ROYAL COAT RACK!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_389_0: * I noticed that you, simply took it, without asking!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_390_0: * That's fine! It's my gift to help you defeat the KING!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_391_0: * You folks are really energetic! Ha ha! And potentially criminals!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_397_0:
* You folks look like heroes!
* Take the SCARF from this chest and DEFEAT the KING!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_398_0: * Besides, it's old, ragged, and doesn't fit me anymore!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_399_0: * That's what CHESTs are for! It's kind of hand-me-down situation in there!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_406_0: * Hey, where's that scarf! Did it not fit you?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_407_0: * That's OK! Just put it in a chest! Someone else will take it!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_412_0: * I used to WORK at the castle until the KING fired all the STAFF.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_413_0: * What was my job? Oh, I was the ROYAL COAT RACK!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_421_0: * (I'm just a little ball, I don't want to discuss anything.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_428_0:
* Today's a special day^2~
* OBVIOUSLY^2.
* To some degree...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_429_0:
* Do you know what day it is~^2?
* You BETTER.
* Um, it's OK if you don't...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_436_0:
* Bow-Bow!
* (Break the Box for a Bracelet.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_448_0: * The King wants to o-liminate Lightners, but... we didn't o-gree with that.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_449_0: * We o-scaped, but the o-thers were o-rrested...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_454_0:
* Don't worry about talking to my o-ssociate here.
* Whenever Bow-Bow talks...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_455_0: * She always goes on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_456_0: * And on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_486_0: * (This cardboard stand is actually just a fake cardboard stand of a cardboard stand.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_493_0: * Before the King came along, I used to eat the leaves from this tree...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_495_0: * Such is the way of the worm...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_498_0: * Such is the way of the worm...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_511_0: * S-somehow, Prince Lancer's made REAL friends with a Lightner...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_512_0: * S-somebody should tell the King, immediately...!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_513_0: * ... But, it's definitely not going to be me.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_514_0: * Whoever breaks the news is gonna get wrecked!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_519_0: * Ugh! I'm jealous of everyone with a leaf!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_527_0: * How's the thrash machine we designed going?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_531_0: * The machine...? We had a whole sequence about it...?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_533_0: * Oh, that. Yeah, we'll make it at the last minute.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_535_0: * You two should REALLY start working on it earlier...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_538_0: * I didn't come here for a second dad!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_547_0: * Being a bad guy sure is relaxing!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_549_0: * Kris, if you're jealous, you can be a bad guy, too...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_551_0: * Kris isn't jealous of your evildoing lifestyle...!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_552_0: * (But um, if you are, I can find a nice leaf and fan you...)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_560_0: * So, er... ready to be a good guy again, Susie?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_562_0: * Nah. Gotta say being a bad guy is pretty sweet.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_563_0: * Not only is it WAY more fun than being "good,"
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_564_0: * But MY teammate's PROUD of what I do.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_566_0: * Earlier, Susie ate a pinecone off the floor.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_567_0: * It gave her a terrible stomach-ache.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_568_0: * It was VERY brave and cool.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_580_0: * The shadow's flares are making us as pale as a horse!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_591_0: * You can follow behind us, you know.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_597_0: * ... I noticed you aren't doing that.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_606_0: * Thanks for inviting me! This trash can's really great!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_607_0: * I apologize for the inconvenience earlier!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_610_0: * I'm gonna invite my friends into this trash can, too!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_618_0:
* (Oh, oh. I'm just the cage.)
* (No one talks to me!)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_626_0:
* (Us animals used to be alone in these cages.)
* (Now everyone's here.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_627_0: * (So many new people... Wish we could go back to the good old days,)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_628_0: * (When it was just us in these filthy cages.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_632_0: * (The sound of various animals tumbling around.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_638_0:
* Woe! Oh, Woe!
* We are the three Former Kings!
* We beg you, free us!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_639_0: * Once, all four of us ruled together, but when the Knight arrived, everything changed...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_640_0: * Oh, my diamonds! My jewels! You must tell me if they're all right! Ohh!!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_644_0: * What, you say? Your world is in danger?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_645_0: * Well, that's a shame, isn't it.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_653_0: * Since I didn't want to fight you guys, I got locked up...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_654_0: * How can I!? You guys seem WAY nicer than the King...!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_659_0: * Haha, I'd rather be in jail than face you guys! You're terrifying!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_665_0: * I was arrested for making a puzzle without a license...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_666_0: * I... I'll never make another word search! Promise!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_675_0: * We sold all of our beds to replace them with treasure.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_676_0: * My back hurts, but life has never been better!!!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_685_0: * You two are real heroes, you know that?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_689_0:
* You too, Talking Beast...
* You too.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_694_0:
* Hey, it's you!
* You're that peaceful Lightner!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_695_0: * Woah, you even tamed the beast that was tormenting us...!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_699_0: * Ohhh!!! You even taught the beast to talk!?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_706_0: * I'm sorry, we don't have any room for that.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_708_0: * That's OK, I already ate it.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_718_0: * You weren't as nice as I thought...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_719_0: * I guess people shouldn't have heroes.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_723_0: * I... I'll never forgive you for that forgiveness...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_727_0: * I feel just OK about you chumps now...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_728_0:
* ... Wait, what about her?
* Will she hurt us anymore?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_731_0: * (Unless Kris tells me to I guess.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_747_0: * (Sigh...) I think making block-pushing puzzles is a totally hunky hobby...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_754_0: * (Looks like Hathy sold all the gems and replaced them with beds.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_764_0: * (Hathy looked at you kindly. Your sins against Hathy were forgiven.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_770_0: * We're sorry about hurting you earlier...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_771_0: * We promise we won't do it anymore!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_773_0: * (Hathy felt your sincerity. Hathy forgived your sins...)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_774_0: * (You felt a weight being lifted from you.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_786_0: * (Hathy looked at you kindly. You felt about the same.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_792_0: * (Hathy will never forget what you've done.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_807_0: * (Sigh...) Sorry I'm sighing, I didn't get much sleep.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_812_0:
* Oh! Let us take your coat!
* And put it in the TOILET! HA!
* ... which, we don't even have.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_813_0:
* Please try the baseballs~!
* Yeah! Eat so many you CHOKE!
* ... do they eat sports?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_814_0:
* Then we can all play Twister~!
* Just stay OUT OF OUR WAY!
* ... we lose even by ourselves.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_817_0:
* Were you invited?
* YOU WEREN'T!!!
* You DID hurt us...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_818_0:
* Awkward...
* You wanna REMATCH!?
* You'd better leave...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_823_0:
* I'm the first party member.
* I'm in charge of the DPS.
* (Dancin' Party Soundtrack.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_827_0: * (Hathy is the second party member. It's the healer.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_828_0: * (She was in charge of catering the party.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_829_0: * (Unfortunately the cake she commissioned was destroyed in a field somewhere.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_832_0: * (That's a risk that one always runs when ordering a cake.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_845_0: * (What's all the fuss about? Fewer people are in cages...)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_849_0: * (Us animals decided it's OK if the Kings stay in the cages as well.)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_850_0: * (... but they'll have to put on animal ears and noses...)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_855_0: * What ho!! What about us!? Aren't we going to be restored as Kings...!?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_856_0: * ... Ah? My treasure is unharmed? Carry on, then.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_865_0: * I'll be honest, at first we weren't sure who make our new King...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_866_0: * ... I mean, Lancer HAS always been a bit of a pain.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_867_0: * But after seeing how nice he treats YOU guys, I think he'll be fine!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_870_0: * I have high hopes for the new King.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_871_0: * He's already mandated a 400-percent increase in salsa production.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_876_0: * Mama miba!! What a celebration!! This calls for a cake!!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_877_0: * And this time, I'll make it out of metal so animals can't eat it!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_880_0:
* Clover's mother!
* Please sample my cakes any time!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_882_0: * Do I HAVE TO be Clover's mom to do that?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_888_0: * Mama miba! What a celebration! Everyone is here!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_889_0: * This must be the birthday party I made that cake for!!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_890_0: * Clover's birth!! Such a sweet occasion!! I might cry!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_892_0: * Uh... actually, this whole thing is, like, OUR fault.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_894_0: * Oh! Mon amiga!! Then... YOU'RE Clover's mother!?!??
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_895_0: * Now I understand why you ate the cake!! To protect her!!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_898_0: * (Wait, if I go along with this, can I get more cake...?)
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_913_0: * What's going on? I slept through everything...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_923_0:
* The future looks sweet~!
* Like a pile of BEE'S PUKE.
* ... which, is honey, I think.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_924_0:
* A kingdom with so much hope~!
* Hope you didn't SCREW IT UP.
* ... that means thank you.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_925_0:
* Come to our next b-day, too~!
* We'll have one SOON!!!
* ... if that's... possible...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_930_0: * I knew you could do it!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_931_0: * Though I was your enemy, I was cheering for you...!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_932_0: * ... That's how much I disliked my job.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_945_0: * Thou hast toppledst the Tyrant! Freedst our Creedst!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_947_0: * The Tale of Rouxls Kaard, and the Three Heroes!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_955_0: * What about the part where you tried to kill us?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_957_0: * Ah... an interesting Historical Theorie, is it not?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_958_0: * Nonetheless, the evidence precludeth such a thing...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_962_0: * I shall giveth thou a plate of Worms for thou silence.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_972_0: * You did it! You ousted that rotten tyrant!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_973_0: * I'll happily accept a bounty of credit for my contributions...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_974_0: * ... Unless the King reappears, in which case -^2- I did nothing!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_978_0: * Darn, horsey. You've'n done us a big help.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_979_0: * Now all'n of us pieces can live in peaces.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_982_0: * Boy, my nostrils can't thank you enough.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1004_0: * Way to go, kids! Now we can go back to making the puzzles we love...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1005_0: * Life's got no tutorial, so try your best!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1008_0: * And, thanks to your donation, I could buy a new hat and some shaving cream.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1013_0: * Got nothing left to teach you now...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1014_0: * Life's got no tutorial, so try your best!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1022_0: * Thank you! I can go back to being a coat hanger now!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1023_0: * By the by, I asked Seam to come here, but...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1028_0: * (Even a little ball can say something like "thank you.")
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1049_0:
* I love reading books.
* Especially the books upstairs.
* You should really.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1068_0:
* Hey short-stuff.
* Why would YOU possibly need to talk to the mayor?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1069_0:
* Your allowance too low?
* Ate too much candies?
* Lost your frisbee in the wash?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1071_0: * That's what the cops are for.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1074_0: * What? Don't talk to you like you're a "kid?" Fine...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1075_0: * If you need someone to change your diaper, go ask the Cop's.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1081_0:
* I'm sorry, I'm sorry.
* The mayor is busy right now.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1082_0: * If you need to see her, please try causing some terrible crisis.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1086_0:
* I'm sorry, I'm sorry.
* Are you here to complain about your teacher?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1087_0: * If you don't like her, please blame your mother for getting her hired...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1097_0:
* The mayor's charisma is about zero.
* No, it's negative.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1098_0: * But she works hard and has a good track record, so she runs unopposed.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1103_0: * Not only does she act icy, she always keeps her office's AC on full blast.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1104_0:
* That chill I feel... is...
* Is this what politics feels like?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1136_0: * Uh, we'll take the special, and do you have any edible glitter...?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1137_0: * The youngest one won't eat anything if it doesn't look like treasure...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1139_0: * In a pinch, sprinkles will work, too...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1145_0: * Don't be a stranger now, alright, hun?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1151_0:
* Hey there!
* Haven't seen you in a while, hun.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1153_0: * I remember, back on Sundays, after service...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1154_0: * You and your family would come in and order the special.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1157_0: * But every Sunday, you and your brother'd still come in.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1158_0: * He'd order you a hot chocolate...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1159_0: * And you two'd sit down at that table in the corner...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1160_0: * ... drawin' shapes in the window with your breath.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1162_0: * You must really miss him, huh?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1172_0: * ... You know, I'd give you a hot chocolate on the house...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1173_0: * ... But it looks like you've got enough things already.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1198_0: * So, for you two girls, that'll be the crepes, a cinnamon latte...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1199_0: * Two bunny parfaits, and... a piece of firewood...?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1202_0: * And, how would you like that firewood done?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1212_0: * Dude, remember when we used to skip the first hour of class to come here?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1213_0: * YOU were fine, but I almost had to repeat the year 'cause of it...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1214_0: * Those crepes were MAD worth, though! Delinquency is the best condiment!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1217_0: * Dude, if we didn't bring Gerson our leftovers, I bet I would have failed HARD...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1226_0: * Looking at my rugged body, you must wonder what kind of secrets I hold...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1227_0: * My secret is, I put all my leftover pancakes in this giant hat.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1237_0: * Ice Wolf does not like ice in drink.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1243_0: * Ice Wolf also like ice-themed mascots.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1255_0:

* I'm stuck!!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1256_0: * I-I guess I should just run away...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1260_0: * Police Chief Undyne is supposed to be directing traffic...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1261_0: * But all she's doing is standing in the middle of the street yelling "GET OUT OF MY WAY!!!"
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1262_0:
* She's the best, huh!?
* I feel really directed!!!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1276_0:
* Yo, Kris!
* You survived Susie, haha!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1277_0: * I mean, I never saw her beat anyone up, but, uh, I'd be careful.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1278_0: * Like, one time me, Snowy, and Jockington were playing handball,
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1279_0: * And she just kept creepily watching us from the corner.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1280_0: * Then, when the ball rolled over to her she just, uh, froze solid...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1281_0: * ... and kicked the ball as hard as she could, right into Officer Undyne's car!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1282_0: * Then, Undyne came out, smiling, cracked her knuckles, and totally wiped us at handball...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1287_0:
* Yo, Kris, you look kind of annoyed.
* Everything OK?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1288_0: * You can calm down now, dude! Susie's not here, haha!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1289_0:
* ... Huh?
* You look even more annoyed...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1296_0: * You got to miss class with Alphys! It's not fair! Ha ha ha!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1297_0: * If I skipped class, my dad'd never let me hear the end of it!!! Ha ha ha!!!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1298_0: * ... That's actually not even remotely funny.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1316_0: * Hey neighbor-beighbor! When's yah brother Doug gonna come by? Huh huh huh!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1317_0: * My girls'd love to see him! He's a sweet little man!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1318_0:
* He's just got one problem...
* He doesn't like my wife's cookin'!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1319_0:
* What's wrong, Douglas?
* You don't like frozen cat food? Huh huh huh!
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1323_0: * Can't blame yah brother for leavin' town.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1324_0: * He's out there, gettin' a big brain in the big school.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1325_0: * Hope when he becomes a big shot, he remembers us little guys down the street.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1326_0: * Eatin' oranges and gettin' our stomachs pumped.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1348_0:
* Oh, it's you.
* Are you here to play the piano again?
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1349_0: * The patients can't hear it well from here, but I personally enjoy it.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1353_0: * Sometimes the police chief comes in to play the piano.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1354_0: * Her playing is nice, but when she starts singing...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1355_0: * We have to ask her to leave.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1361_0: * Hmmm... you usually play the piano a bit more... beautifully.
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1362_0:
* Is everything OK?
* You DO seem a little sick...
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1371_0: * Nothin' better than hangin' at the lake with my best bro...

obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_30_0: * We were told to keep you imprisoned for eternity... too bad!
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_31_0: * ... Would have loved to see you guys punished!! Hahaha!!
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_83_0: * Well this is a fine how-do-you-do, isn't it, Kris?
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_85_0: * ... That sounds like it might take a while.
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_105_0: * We have to find her, Kris... Before she gets hurt!
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_107_0: * Maybe there's something we can escape with in here...?
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_141_0: * Well, Kris! Let's not give up hope just yet!
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_143_0: * But, um, if we don't make it for some reason...
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_144_0: * Then I just wanted to say, um...
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_145_0: * I... I'm glad I was able to meet...
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_147_0: * Hey, idiots! Can you shut up!?
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_207_0: * Seriously though. I'm outta my cell.
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_208_0: * I sweet-talked the warden into giving me the keys.
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_229_0: * I, uh, "invited" him to visit the trash can.
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_232_0: * Anyway, now there's a puzzle in the way.
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_254_0: * Hey, how 'bout we just sit tight and wait for Lancer?
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_255_0: * He lives in the castle, he's bound to come save us.
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_257_0: * ... why don't Kris and I just help you solve the puzzle?
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_259_0: * Look, I don't NEED your help.
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_261_0: * ... but, uh, if you said what to do, out loud,
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_301_0: * Damn it! Wait! We just did the same thing as last time!
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_311_0: * What the hell? We were so close! Let us through anyway!
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_336_0: * Kris, are you sure you know what you're doing...?
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_343_0: * Enough resets!!! I'm doing the puzzle myself!!!
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_378_0: * Great!! Now come and free us!
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_523_0: *  Susie! You came to save us...!
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_524_0: * I knew you had the heart of a hero, Susie..!
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_526_0: * Yeah, yeah, don't push your luck.

obj_ralseienemy_slash_Step_0_gml_121_0: * Umm, anyway, let's move onto my favorite: \cYACTING\cW!

obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_431_0: * But he was the only one who matched me in the games we used to play.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_432_0: * One day, he met a strange someone... and since then, he began to change.

obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_434_0: * But didn't completely not make sense, either.

obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_436_0: * As the court mage, and his only companion, I was forced to lock him away...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_437_0: * Or, rather, lock US all away, in his own words.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_438_0: * Since that time, the strange words he's said have stuck inside my cotton...

obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_440_0: * Reflecting on these old memories, I think, perhaps - I miss playing games with him.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_441_0: * And I wonder, if I hadn't been asked to lock him up...

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1032_0: * Honestly, her whole family is, like, SO trashy.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1033_0: * Once her sister served me a coffee and I swear it was half cat fur.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1034_0: * Like, get a hairnet, girl. For, like, your whole body.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1039_0: * Remember that time you wanted to hang out with us big kids?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1040_0: * I was like, "yeah, of course! Just get us some burgers!"
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1041_0:
* Then, like, amazingly...
* You ACTUALLY got them...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1042_0: * So I told you to go back and get some french fries, too...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1044_0: * They were SO good, I ate like six!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1045_0:
* Then I like...
* Suddenly got so sick I had to go home.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1047_0:
* So, like, anyway...
* Kris, are you busy?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1052_0: * Aww, that's no way to talk to your almost-sister-in-law.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1054_0: * Remember that time I played truth or dare with Azzy?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1055_0: * I, like, made him give me his first kiss...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1056_0: * Then your mom found out he kissed someone, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1057_0: * Like, I think she basically dialed 911.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1058_0: * I swear your family went to church, like...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1063_0: * Aw, Krissy, you just wanted to say hi?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1064_0:
* That's adorable...
* Now get out of here.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1097_0:
* Heheh...
* Just hand over the money, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1101_0:
* You're just like us.
* An' people like us gotta help each other out.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1110_0:
* HA! HA! Did I say FIFTY!?
* Well, we just went on sale!
* TWENTY! TWENTY Dark Dollars!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1137_0:
* Heheh...
* Just hand over the money, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1141_0:
* You're just like us.
* An' people like us gotta help each other out.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1150_0:
* ONE!!! ONLY ONE DOLLAR!!!
* PLEASE!!! PLEASE!!!
* I NEED THIS RIGHT NOW!!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1173_0:
* Heheh...
* Just hand over the money, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1177_0:
* You're just like us.
* An' people like us gotta help each other out.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1187_0:
* Er, excuse me, Sir.
* I think I have a dollar.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1193_0:
* Heheh, perfect!
* Right this way, gentleners!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1206_0:
* I'm TP Master.
* Ask me about TP's.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1214_0:
* TP? What's TP?
* That's what lets you cast SPELLS, see!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1215_0:
* When you see that orange bar,
* Cast some SPELLS when it's filled up far.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1216_0:
* TP...! It's quite a caper!
* TP! Stands for...
* ... Toilet Paper!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1218_0: * ... no, it stands for Tension Points.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1224_0:
* TP only lasts, inside a fight.
* Once you win, it's out of sight.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1225_0:
* Having extra, feels unbearable.
* No point in saving, it's straight-up terrible.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1227_0: * But leftover TP turns into extra money at the end of battle...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1229_0: * You mean I only should have been using one square!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1233_0:
* You get TP when you DEFEND.
* Protect yourself, then cast SPELLs, friend.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1234_0: * You also get TP by getting close to bullets.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1235_0: * Look for the heart outline when you get close to bullets.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1255_0:
* I'm Ralsei Master.
* Ask me about RALSEI's.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1263_0:
* Ralsei's spell's called PACIFY.
* Use it on BABIES, before they CRY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1265_0: * What? It safely removes a "TIRED" enemy from combat.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1267_0: * What if you're fighting a BABY!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1272_0: * Ralsei has a spell that HEALS, dude.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1273_0: * Why use that, when you can eat FOOD?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1275_0: * Because you won't have to use up an ITEM?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1277_0: * I could have avoided all those empty calories!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1281_0: * Ralsei loves when you give us MONEY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1282_0: * He will hug you, and call you HONEY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1285_0: * You don't need money to get me to do that!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1294_0:
* I'm Susie Master.
* Ask me about SUSIE's.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1302_0:
* When KRIS uses WARNING, SUSIE can't hit.
* So make sure to -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1304_0: * So there's no reason to use it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1306_0:
* Unless...
* Unless you wanted not to hurt -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1312_0: * Susie's gone, I'm afraid, I'm afreet.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1317_0: * The days of WARNing, have long since past.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1325_0: * Susie always attacks, the foe on top.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1326_0: * She'll smash them, with a crushing chop.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1327_0: * She always strikes, at the first thing she sees...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1331_0:
* Oh no, oh no!
* She's looking at ME!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1336_0: * Will you two pick up the slack?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1341_0: * Susie's BUSTER, RUDE as may be...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1342_0: * Will deal more damage, if you just press ~1!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1348_0:
* Susie loves, when you give us MONEY.
* She will -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1356_0: * Will you two pick up the slackts?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1360_0: * SUSIE seems to have changed, just a hair.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1361_0: * That kind of growth is actually rare.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1377_0:
* I'm Kris Master.
* Ask me about KRIS's.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1385_0: * When HP goes negative, your friends fall down
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1386_0: * But bringing them back, is easy-town
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1387_0: * Plain foods and spells, work like a charm -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1388_0: * And with a MINT, you can cure all HARM.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1390_0: * Even normal items and spells can revive people, huh?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1397_0: * If you only ACT, you might start to think -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1398_0: * What about the guy with the scarf in pink?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1400_0: * If you know ACTing will make the enemy friendly -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1401_0: * Then you can ask me to SPARE on the SAME TURN.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1402_0: * Or, cast PACIFY if you know they'll get TIRED.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1403_0: * If you plan ahead, a lot can happen in ONE TURN!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1405_0: * Hey, who's the MASTER here, me or you!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1409_0: * It's a good idea, to give us BUCKs.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1410_0: * It'll make you happy, and fill you with LUCKs.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1411_0: * Over there, is our DONATION HOLE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1412_0: * We had a BOX, but it got STOLE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1422_0: * (If you like our tutorials, please throw your money into a hole.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1426_0: * (The hole is filled to the brim with cash.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1441_0: * (You failed to budget enough money to throw into a hole...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1446_0: * (You decided to save the dollar for a different hole.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1458_0:
* We, uh, got bored.
* So we're having a snack.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1462_0: * C'mon! All I ate for breakfast was chalk!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1466_0: * Sorry. What are you two having, exactly...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1468_0: * Just a daily treasure I hid in this stump's orifice.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1472_0: * Feast for yourself, my main man.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1474_0: * Kris, do you want to, um, try it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1492_0:
* It's my secret stash.
* A little snackeroo from me to you...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1497_0: * C'mon, you're just pretending to eat it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1499_0: * Haha, yeah! That's what I do, too!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1507_0: * (There was a honeypot of salsa inside the stump.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1521_0: * Look, if no one else will eat it, I'll try it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1522_0:
* ... there's a jar of... Blood...?
* In here.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1524_0:
* No, no.
* It's merely a pot of free-range salsa.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1526_0: * Thanks, that's actually more gross somehow.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1559_0: * Kris, honey, you have grown up so much...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1560_0: * Someday soon you will be going off to university as well...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1563_0: * You asked when your horns were going to grow in?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1564_0: * So we bought that headband with the little red horns on it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1565_0: * Oh, you wore it for months! Whatever happened to it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1572_0: * Kris, I need to grade these assignments.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1573_0: * Perhaps you should go to bed...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1574_0: * You do not look very well...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1591_0: * D... Did you want to talk about something?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1599_0: * O-Oh, these flowers...? They're from your dad...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1600_0: * He... He always asks how you're doing in school...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1601_0: * ... Then gives me a bouquet of them.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1602_0: * ... A-actually, that he always gives me flowers...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1603_0: * ... R-really makes me w-wonder if he... If he l-likes...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1605_0: * ... The awesome comics I lent to him.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1606_0: * Honestly, HE kind of reminds me of a superhero, Kris.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1607_0: * (He's huge and could kick my ass.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1612_0: * I-It's for my kitty, MewMew! She's a perfect angel!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1613_0: * ... uh? What does she look like...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1614_0: * W... well, I've never actually s-seen her, b-but...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1615_0: * Ever since I started putting out milk, it's been disappearing.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1616_0: * S... So I'd like to think that there's a cat.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1624_0: * K... Kris, even though you never got the chalk...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1625_0: * You deserve an award for trying so hard to find it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1626_0: * So, in return, I can let you borrow, um...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1627_0: * M... My home-made DVD collection of the Symptons!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1628_0: * Y-you know, the sitcom about the middle-class monster family.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1629_0: * It's got every episode in all 28 seasons!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1630_0: * It's the funniest, most quotable show ever...!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1631_0: * But make sure you don't watch past the second season %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1632_0: * Since they just rebooted it as Symptons Turbo %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1633_0: * They all started driving their own motor-vehicles %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1634_0: * And fighting giant giga-demons and stuff %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1635_0: * The main problem about that is that it kind of %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1636_0: * Lost the focus on family that it had earlier %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1637_0: * When their vehicles were shaped like animals %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1638_0: * And they were friends with the animal vehicles too %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1639_0: * And let's not get into Symptons Galaxy Force %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1640_0: * Where the Symptons discover another Earth %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1641_0: * On the other side of the Sun %
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1644_0: * ... You don't want to watch it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1650_0: * OK, umm, if you ever need help with homework...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1651_0: * My office hours are in this disgusting alley.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1652_0: * H... Heheheh... Umm, tell your mom I said hi.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1687_0:
* (Life cannot exist without consuming.)
* (Even the moss drinks water.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1693_0:
* (The moss has been eaten.)
* (The cycle continues...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1708_0: * (The cycle ends here, in the corner of a small cell...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1744_0: * (Don't need nothin' to hold you down...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1753_0: * ... thanks for helping her, Kris. She appreciates it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1762_0: * Well, regardless of how you feel...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1763_0: * I don't think it would hurt to take a moment...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1764_0: * Close your eyes, and think about what she's doing now...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1780_0: * Huh...? Kris...? Did you say something back there?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1789_0: * Well, well. I am the smith Malius. I can fix anything. Weapon, armor...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1790_0: * ... I can even fix you! Well, well, what will it be?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1812_0: * Well, well. You have nothing to fix.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1813_0: * But if you find anything BROKEN, return here.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1814_0: * After all, I can fix anything...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1820_0: * Huh---! That CAKE is seething with energy! You must let me fix it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1827_0: * Huh---! That CAKE is seething with energy! You must let me fix it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1828_0: * ... actually, you will need a free space in your ITEMs first.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1833_0: * Huh---! That KEY is seething with energy! You must let me fix it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1841_0: * Well, well. Good journey, my friends.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1845_0: * Your body is a weapon, too. You must take care of it from time to time.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1858_0:
* All proceeds go to Rudinn Relief Funds, I guess.
* It's only $40!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1877_0:
* Thanks, I guess.
* (The Choco Diamond was added to your ITEMS.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1881_0: * ... You have too many ITEMS for this, I guess.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1886_0: * You don't have enough money, I guess.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1904_0:
* (Hathy offers a Hearts Donut.)
* (Proceeds go to Hathy's Health. It costs $40.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1918_0:
* (Hathy seemed happy.)
* (The Hearts Donut was added to your ITEMS.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1922_0:
* (You didn't have enough room in your ITEMs.)
* (Hathy seemed sad.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1927_0:
* (You didn't have enough money.)
* (Hathy seemed sad.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1946_0: * May we interest you in a Lancer Cookie?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1948_0: * All proceeds go to kicking your ass.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1970_0: * (The LANCERCOOKIE was added to your ITEMs.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1974_0: * Now we may fund our illicit plans!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1984_0:
* (You bought LANCERCOOKIE.)
* (But you didn't have any room.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1985_0: * (So Lancer just dropped it on the ground and it broke.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1991_0: * Thank you anyway for your contribution...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1995_0: * Now we can fund our illicit plans!!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2008_0: * What? What did you spend it on!? Pastries!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2018_0: * Hey! You can't not buy from us!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2020_0:
* Hey DUMBASS!
* It's for a GOOD CAUSE!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2033_0:
* HEY, PUNK!!!
* GET OUT OF THE ROAD!!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2035_0: * ... Oh, wait, it's just Asgore's kid.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2036_0: * Sorry, I'm a little, uh, worked up lately.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2037_0:
* This job is SO boring.
* Nothing EVER happens in this town!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2038_0: * Ngh... I just wish SOMETHING would shake things up!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2039_0:
* ... Huh?
* You got somethin' to report?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2054_0:
* Who's Alphys?
* No idea who you're talking about.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2055_0: * ... Why, did they do something illegal!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2056_0: * Gotcha, if I see "Alphys," I'll tackle 'em!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2057_0:
* Fuhuhuhu!!
* They're as good as dead!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2061_0:
* What?
* There's a Dark World inside the school?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2063_0: * There's no law against Dark Worlds anyway!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2064_0: * That's a job for the school board!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2068_0: * Aww, you wanna help me? Sure, punk.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2069_0: * Get someone to rob the bank so I can suplex them!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2070_0: * ... wait, do we even have a bank?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2071_0: * Hey, get someone to build a bank...!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2075_0: * Don't do anything illegal, you little punk~!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2076_0: * And lemme know if you get a lead on any purple girls.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2077_0: * There's one wanted on SEVERAL counts of Comic Mischief.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2089_0: * Wanna chat for a minute before I lose my mind?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2093_0:
* H... Hey!
* Hey little buddy!
* What's up?!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2102_0: * Do you know when Azzy's coming home?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2103_0: * Y... You can't tell him this, but I really miss the guy.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2104_0: * It'd be sweet to cruise around town like old times...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2107_0: * Which, as a matter of course
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2108_0: * May not have ever actually happened.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2109_0: * B-but one time Undyne made eye contact with me!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2110_0: * ... while she was writing me a speeding ticket.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2116_0: * I can't slack off for SECONDS without hearing...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2117_0: * "Be a team player, there's no I in PEZZA!"
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2118_0:
* YES THERE IS.
* YOU JUST TOOK IT OUT.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2119_0:
* But it's OK, little buddy.
* I've been saving up...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2120_0: * ... To go to college where Azzy is!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2121_0: * Then I'll get a theater degree, become a famous actor...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2122_0: * And let the fangirls roll in, little buddy.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2127_0: * Ah, yes, Little Buddy. Good idea. Meet the Rogue's Gallery.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2128_0: * Blue Ears - Soft serve obsessed, no concept of personal space.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2129_0: * Keeps accidentally pouring slushies on me and giggling.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2130_0: * The Warrior - Thankfully absent due to pizza-related injuries.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2131_0: * Constantly terrorizing customers with war chants.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2132_0: * Purple Guy - Man, THAT GUY, you gotta...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2133_0: * ... actually, does that guy even work here?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2134_0: * Ah, my co-workers. Where would I be without them?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2135_0: * A happy place, little buddy. A much happier place.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2140_0: * It's fine, Little Buddy. You don't have to watch me suffer.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2141_0: * Just enjoy your freedom... While it lasts...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2150_0:
* Kris... What a pleasant surprise to see you here.
* And on a school day.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2151_0: * There must be a reason that you came here at such a time.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2152_0:
* I, Father Alvin, implore you.
* If you have anything weighing on your mind, please, speak.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2159_0: * Kris, if you want some of our "sick" Fruit Juice, you should come to our service.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2160_0: * Our choir sounds a bit thinner since your brother went away.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2161_0: * Kris, it would be wonderful if you would sing with us.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2162_0: * Or even participated to any extent,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2163_0: * Instead of just trying to drink the Fruit Juice.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2167_0:
* I understand.
* I hope in time you may find the words you seek.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2168_0: * Let the Angel's power light your way.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2184_0: * (You dig out the marshmallow one and start huffing it.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2188_0: * (The chocolate one smells too fake anyway.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2227_0: * (It's an obligatory hospital piano, shrunk to fit in the corner.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2228_0: * (As a result, it's missing most of the good keys.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2242_0: * (Your hands linger over the keys doing nothing.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2251_0: * I sat in the car waiting for you after school for half an hour...!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2252_0: * I called and called, but you never picked up...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2253_0: * You had your poor mother worried sick!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2254_0: * Kris, I am afraid I am going to have to punish you...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2257_0: * You were spending time with... a friend?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2260_0: * I will make an exception this time.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2261_0: * You can continue your adventures a little longer.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2263_0: * You are going to have to go to bed early.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2286_0: * yeah, it's real nice, isn't it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2287_0: * especially considering i've never met you before.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2288_0:
* the name's sans.
* sans the skeleton.
* i'm new in town.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2295_0:
* i'm sans.
* your friendly neighborhood skeleton.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2317_0:
* behind me?
* yeah, that's the grocery store.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2319_0:
* what a pain.
* i really wanted to buy some milk.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2320_0: * someone oughta complain to the guy who runs it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2324_0: * we just moved here, so i hardly know anyone.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2325_0: * why, got anyone i should know better?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2332_0: * oh, you've got something better to do?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2334_0: * anyway, i'll be standing here doing nothing.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2344_0: * ah, sorry. i don't hang out with idiot babies.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2345_0: * they compete with my sociological niche.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2350_0: * hey, i gave you a number, what more do you want?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2356_0: * you can't just jump straight into friendship.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2361_0: * call it whenever you feel like.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2373_0: * i already "befriended" your mom last night.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2374_0: * she's great. came to the store to buy chocolate kisses.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2375_0: * said she's gotta lock her door to stop you from eating 'em.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2376_0: * heheheh... you sound like a fun kid, huh?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2380_0: * alphys. yeah. i know about her.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2381_0: * came into the store with a suitcase and sunglasses.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2382_0: * thought she was part of the mob.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2383_0: * she opened the case and stuffed it full of instant noodles.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2385_0: * then slunk out of the place,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2387_0: * anyway, our relationship is, uh, purely business.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2388_0: * so, uh, i guess i'll just let her do her thing.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2404_0: * You have reached the Hotline for Idiot Babies.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2405_0: * Please press 1 for Idiots, 2 for Babies, 3 for Idiot Babies, and 4 for None.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2422_0: * To tell you the truth, I'm one too.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2427_0: * Why'd you call the Hotline for Idiot Babies if you aren't an Idiot Baby?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2440_0: * i need some help with something.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2441_0: * it'd be great if you could come over.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2442_0: * i live just next door, ya know.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2452_0:
* that's not good.
* i'm a total stranger.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2458_0: * wow, you were deliberating for a while.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2460_0: * don't want to hang out with a stranger?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2464_0:
* huh...?
* what are we going to be doing?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2465_0: * oh, i'm not going to be there.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2467_0: * it's just gonna be you and my little brother.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2469_0: * thanks for hanging out with him.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2485_0: * alright, alright, lemme sweeten the deal for ya.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2486_0: * if you come over... i, will personally,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2488_0: * it'll just be you and my little brother.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2489_0: * since he's new here, he needs friends.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2490_0: * anyway, thanks for agreeing to hang out with him.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2503_0: * Did you need help with your homework again?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2504_0: * I know you were having trouble last time, so, um,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2505_0: * I actually got a few things ready for you, in case --
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2506_0: * Ah, wait, sorry! I can't right now...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2507_0: * I forgot my house key again, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2508_0: * Sorry, Kris, I'll help you later, if that's ok.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2513_0: * Did you... want to talk about something?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2530_0: * Susie! That's right, you were with Susie!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2531_0: * When you didn't come back to class, I was worried, but...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2532_0: * Everything turned out OK! I think?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2534_0: * ... Umm, Kris? Can I ask something, if that's OK?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2535_0: * Susie... I'm kind of... curious what she's like, you know?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2536_0: * I mean, who DOESN'T wonder about her? She never talks to anyone.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2537_0: * So, Kris, could you tell me about her? If that's ok...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2542_0: * Oh, can I ask something else about her!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2543_0: * Well, did it seem like, she, um...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2552_0: * ... huh? Why don't I ask my mom for the key?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2553_0: * I... I mean, um... I... you know,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2554_0: * She doesn't like it when I bother her when she's working.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2555_0: * Don't worry, OK? I'll just go over to Catti's.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2559_0: * Umm... Kris...? Are you feeling alright?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2561_0: * Oh! I don't mean to sound like something's wrong with you.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2564_0: * Why did you go to the hospital to see my dad...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2565_0: * I mean, I'm sure he appreciated it, but... um...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2566_0: * Gosh, I'm sorry, Kris. Forget I said anything!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2570_0: * Tell Azzy I said hi, Kris!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2585_0: * I mean, that's just what I was hoping, but...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2586_0: * W-wait, this isn't another trick, is it, Kris?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2587_0: * Like when you put ketchup on your arms and told me it was blood?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2588_0: * ... R-really? You're serious? You're totally serious?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2589_0: * ... gosh, then maybe I should try talking to her...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2590_0: * B-but if I die, you're paying for my funeral, Kris!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2591_0: * (Though, honestly, if she's nice I might die, too...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2595_0: * She WHAT? She smashed you against the LOCKERS?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2596_0: * Gosh, Kris, I'm really sorry. That's just awful.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2597_0: * I... I'd THOUGHT Susie was good, just...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2598_0: * Maybe it would take someone special to find her good side.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2599_0: * ... but she really IS terrible, isn't she...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2600_0: * Kris... I'm SO sorry you have to go through this.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2601_0: * In fact, I wonder if... d-do you think...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2602_0: * I wonder if Alphys would let us switch partners, I mean?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2603_0: * You know, so you wouldn't have to be the one, who, um,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2604_0: * Gets to be, slammed into lockers, and stuff, anymore.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2605_0: * (Wait, I don't think I phrased that correctly...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2609_0:
* What?
* She was EATING the chalk???
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2611_0: * Wait! You're teasing me, aren't you, Kris?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2612_0: * L-like when you told me ICE-E was real and eats kids...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2613_0: * So Dess smacked you with a wiffle bat 'til you stopped lying.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2614_0: * ... Huh? You're telling the truth? Seriously?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2616_0: * Umm, then... what color chalk does she like?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2617_0: * And, do you think she likes the thin or the thick kind...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2618_0: * (Wait, maybe making her a lunchbox full of chalk is stupid...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2622_0: * Seriously, Kris? But I help you ALL the time!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2623_0: * The LEAST you can do is give me a LITTLE information!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2624_0: * Like, d-does she like metal music!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2625_0: * Is she really an obligate carnivore!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2626_0: * D... Does she really have a tail underneath her jacket!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2628_0: * Sorry Kris, it's not any of my business, is it...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2639_0: * (If you go to bed, this chapter of your adventures will end.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2662_0: * (If you go back to sleep, \cYyou may miss a lot of important things\cW.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2676_0: * (For some reason, you decided to go back to sleep...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2689_0: * BOO HOO, BOO HOO, UEE HEE HEE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2691_0: * BUT LO, THREE VISITORS STANDING INSIDE?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2694_0: * Nice to meet you! I'm Ralsei, this is Kris, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2696_0: * So, what the hell are you doing in there?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2698_0:
* I AM INNOCENT, INNOCENT.
* I JUST WANTED TO PLAY A GAME, GAME.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2699_0: * BUT THE BORING KINGS FOUND SUCH FUN TO BE A TROUBLE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2700_0: * AS PUNISHMENT, THEY CRAVED TO IMPRISON MY BODY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2701_0: * BUT I'M FAST, FAST, CLEVER, CLEVER.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2702_0: * THEY LOST THE CHASE, AND LOCKED UP THEIR ENTIRE RACE,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2703_0: * BUILDING A PRISON AROUND THE WHOLE WORLD. NOW I'M THE ONLY FREE ONE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2705_0: * Huh? Free? But you're clearly the one behind bars...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2707_0: * THINGS DON'T SEEM SUCH FROM HERE, LIGHTNERS!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2709_0: * Well, sounds like you don't need any help, then.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2711_0:
* THAT IS UN-SO.
* I GROW LONELY IN MY LITTLE FREEDOM.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2712_0: * SO, SHALL YOU PLAY A GAME WITH ME, ME...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2713_0: * I'LL SHOW YOU WHAT IT MEANS TO BE FREE!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2718_0: * FIND THE KEY, AND I'LL LET YOU BE FREE, FREE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2719_0: * THE KEY IS HIDDEN FROM THE EYES. THE OLD SHOPKEEPER KNOWS A SECRET.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2731_0: * FIND THE KEY, AND I'LL LET YOU BE FREE, FREE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2732_0: * THE KEY IS HIDDEN FROM THE EYES. THE OLD SHOPKEEPER KNOWS A SECRET.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2737_0: * BOO HOO, BOO HOO, UEE HEE HEE!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2738_0: * HOW CAN YOU REFUSE, WHEN YOU ARE ALREADY PLAYING...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2748_0: * UEE HEE HEE, THE KEY, THE KEY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2749_0: * A MARVELLOUS FUN IS ABOUT TO BREAK FREE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2765_0: * (You put the Door Key in front of the Door.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2770_0: * YOU CAME TOO FAR! YOUR CHOICE HAS RUN OUT!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2793_0: * Hey! You're the chumps that beat me up earlier!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2794_0: * There's no way I'll forgive you, so scram!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2806_0: * We're sorry, we made a mistake earlier.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2807_0: * We promise we won't do it again!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2809_0: * Huh...? You're apologizing? I guess I'll forgive you then...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2810_0: * (Your violence against a single Rudinn was forgiven!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2822_0: * Heh, you wanna act that way, huh...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2823_0: * Forgive me or I'll crush you, dweeb!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2825_0: * I... I'm sorry!!! I forgive you!!! Here, take this Choco Diamond!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2831_0: * I'm sorry, but we don't have any room...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2833_0: * Too late, I already ate it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2844_0:
* (It's a music player.)
* (Listen to the contents?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2866_0: * (Where will you ride the elevator to?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2976_0: * I know you wanna give a REAL goodbye to everyone, right?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2977_0: * I mean, I'm ALL for leaving right away, but...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2978_0: * Y'know, we could go back a sec. If you wanted.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2985_0: * Well, then what are we waiting for?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2991_0: * Let's at least say goodbye to Lancer!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3001_0: * If you can beat me, I'll go back to being a good guy.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3003_0: * YOU guys will have to become bad guys with US...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3006_0: * Ho ho ho!!! Our wish is your command!!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3015_0: * We were just gonna thrash you anyway, so...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3033_0: * Kris, honey, you have grown up so much...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3034_0: * Someday soon you will be going off to university as well...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3037_0: * You asked when your horns were going to grow in?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3038_0: * So we bought that headband with the little red horns on it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3039_0: * Oh, you wore it for months! Whatever happened to it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3043_0: * Remember that video-game you and Asriel used to play?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3044_0: * What was it called...? Super Smashing Fighters?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3045_0: * When he was very little, he LOVED the green lizard from that.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3046_0: * We even had a birthday party for him themed around it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3047_0: * Your father painted all these eggs with spots as decoration...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3049_0: * Until the next day, your father cooked them all for breakfast.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3051_0: * Ever since, he's hated that book about eating green eggs!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3055_0: * Kris, since only you and I are living here right now...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3056_0: * It feels... just a bit lonely, does it not...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3057_0: * But, fortunately, sharing a warm, freshly-made pie,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3058_0: * Is the perfect cure for such a condition.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3059_0: * ... as long as I get to eat some, of course.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3063_0: * Oh, Kris...? Flowers? For your mother...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3066_0: * These are from HIM, are they not.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3068_0: * Err, well, worry not, Kris, I will...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3077_0: * Kris, perhaps you should go to bed early tonight...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3078_0: * You do not look quite yourself.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3141_0:
* Marga riba!
* That cake!
* It's seething with power!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3142_0:
* It's my cake, isn't it!?
* Did you repair it!?
* Will you return it!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3151_0: * Edamame! My old cake! I'm so happy I could spin!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3152_0: * My friend, share in my riches! I have many worse cakes I do not want!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3153_0: * If you're not carrying a Cake, come here and I'll give you one! Forever!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3155_0: * (You traded the TopCake for the SpinCake.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3156_0: * Now, I'm going to continue to spin and cry! Spin and cry!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3161_0: * Sweet in cake, but not in character! A tragedy!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3173_0: * Mama miba! How are you enjoying my rejected pastries?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3177_0: * Mom amiga! You want an inferior cake, my friend?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3186_0: * Please take this cake! It's worthless, my dear friend!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3191_0: * Mama shiba! You're carrying too many things that aren't cakes!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3196_0: * I understand!! Too much cake will make you spin and cry!!

UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_5_0: Someone!? Anyone!? Can anyone hear me!?
UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_9_0: Someone, anyone, if you can hear me...
